entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CompositionContainer is not thread safe - even when constructed as thread safe #59505
  • Update WiX package dependency #59498
    6.0.0
  • Duplicated activity baggage when calling SetBaggage on parent and current activity #59496
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: make not-generic JsonConverter constructor public #59493
  • Determine if/how to handle CultureInfo better in Regex (and RegexGenerator) #59492
    7.0.0
  • Determine if/how to handle default timeouts in RegexGenerator #59491
    7.0.0
  • ActiveIssue not skipped on CI for iOS/tvOS devices #59488
  • System.Text.Json: Guid from JsonElement not valid. #59474
  • Apphost defaults to wrong install location on multi-arch systems #59473
    6.0.0
  • Hot Reload in Blazor not working with Authorization-Middleware #59481
  • Intercept the Http Requests in asp.net MVC using c# #59472
  • [WASM][AOT] Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/class.c:2006, condition `<disabled>' not met #59471
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: bool HashSet<T>.Update(T value, out T actual) #59468
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.Count / number of occurrences of a value in a span #59466
  • `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging`'s `ILogger` should support providing a message in a function #59469
  • System.Text.Json source generator produces nullability warnings for NRT properties #59464
  • [API Proposal]: Add TrySelect #59463
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Math: IFixedPoint<TSelf> #59462
  • Unhandled Exception in Pipeline Execution Thread,Exception #59460
  • .net core 2.2 Internal error in the .NET Runtime at IP 00007FFEA84EB6B5 with exit code 80131506 #59458
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Tests.JsonElementWriteTests.WriteIncredibleDepth #59456
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Tests.TimestampRequestTests.BuildExpectedRequest_FromHashAndOid(viaSpan: True) #59455
  • [API Proposal]: Custom attribute for Pre-compile AOP #59454
  • RyuJIT: reconsider arm32 callfinally code pattern #59453
    Future
  • Test failure System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.CancelTest.ConnectAsync_Cancel_ThrowsCancellationException(server: wss://corefx-net-http11.azurewebsites.net/WebSocket/EchoWebSocket.ashx) #59451
  • Loosen strict KeyValuePair deserialization logic in reflection JSON serializer to match src-gen #59450
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\exceptions\\regressions\\Dev11\\154243\\dynamicmethodliveness\\dynamicmethodliveness.cmd #59449
    7.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/bigevent/bigevent/bigevent.sh #59448
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/X86/Sse2/Sse2_ro/Sse2_ro.sh #59447
    7.0.0
  • superpmi: support Linux arm/arm64 benchmarks collection #59446
    7.0.0
  • superpmi: create asm diffs AzDO pipeline #59445
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.SpanTests.SpanTests.FillNativeBytes #59444
  • Move SuperPMI replay pipeline to "public" #59443
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Parsing CSV (TextFieldParser) from ZipArchive fails with .net 6 RC1. #59371
    6.0.0
  • TextFieldParser does not correctly handle input from streams that don't fill out the full array provided. #58857
    7.0.0
  • ArPow stage 2: implementing source-build CI #54573
    6.0.0
  • Every minor version of .NET 5 exist at the same time #57629
  • Upgrade net461 tfms to net462 for NET7 #57842
    7.0.0
  • Upgrade netcoreapp3.1 and net5.0 to net6.0 for NET7 #57844
    7.0.0
  • DacDbiInterfaceImpl::IsModuleMapped returns S_FALSE without setting *isModuleMapped #59393
    7.0.0
  • Rosetta x64 translation fools arch detection in installers #59370
    6.0.0
  • [JsonConstructor] should not be required on readonly structs with a single parameterized constructor #59309
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [RegexGenerator(...)] attribute #58880
    7.0.0
  • Http client certificate authorization Issue in .NET 5 in Docker #59435
  • Jit should inline CORINFO_HELP_ASSIGN_REF (at least for hot paths) #59031
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests are disabled in WASM #59228
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Append _FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 to CMAKE_REQUIRED_DEFINITIONS #59504
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Run Catalyst ARM64 tests on macOS 12, just to see what happens #59502
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-maccatalyst, os-macos-monterey (macOS12)
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [workloads] Use the dual signed wix version for workload msis #59501
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [workloads] Use the dual signed wix version for workload msis #59500
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Move Type equality operators to shared CoreLib partition #59499
    area-System.Reflection
  • Issue 59415 #59497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unused emitter call types and improve INS_tail_i_jmp handling #59495
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Pipeline to run Exploratory fuzzing tool to catch codegen issues #59489
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2][wasm] Fixes, and improvements based on user feedback #59486
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59484
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Nonzero Exit Code for performance-setup Failures #59483
    tenet-performance
  • [wasm][debugger] Reusing buffer to avoid allocate every debugger message #59480
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Run wasm aot, wbt tests on windows #59479
    area-Build-mono
  • [docs] macOS: add note about Xcode command line tools #59477
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • Refactoring XslCompiledTransform #59475
    area-System.Xml
  • Refactoring XmlWriterSettings #59467
    area-System.Xml
  • [release/6.0] Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59452
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add a note about rerunning the license/cla check #59440
    area-Meta

Merged

  • Fix buffering bugs in TextFieldParser #59487
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Split install_location to file-per-architecture #59485
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.0
  • Update xunit version on release branch #59277
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update FileStatus field names in HostModel tests #59482
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Mark time trigger #58261
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [main] [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59490
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [Release/6.0] Add uploading of intermediate package assets #59291
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Set *isMapped to false to satisfy 'out' semantics #59430
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Integrate changes from NativeAOT branch #59478
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Split install_location to file-per-architecture #59404
    area-Host, 6.0.0
  • Set install_location arch specific #59441
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Big-endian fixes: PDB creation by ilasm #59422
    area-ILTools-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix gtCloneExpr when cloning during R2R compilation a GT_ALLOCOBJ node #59438
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] [wasm][debugger] Fix concurrent access to cache. #59423
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete Type.GetTypeHandleInternal #59459
    area-System.Reflection
  • Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Cleanup reflection RuntimeType checks #59457
    area-System.Reflection
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix concurrent access to cache. #59412
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix brick table issue due to race condition in adjust_limit_clr #59411
    area-GC-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: ubuntu #58987
  • CI matrix change: drop OSX 10.13 #59084
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • We should not call distribute_free_regions at the end of background GC #59413
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests #59396
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json, disabled-test
  • Add notes about not calling src-gen APIs directly and make them non-browsable #59385
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update xunit version on dotnet/runtime #59275
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Updated

  • Port DllImportGenerator to dotnet/runtime #59363
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Fix buffering bugs in TextFieldParser #59506
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • [release/5.0] Update to latest .NET 5 SDK #59428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Some more cleanups in Assembly/Binder area #59288
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • XmlSerializer support for IsDynamicCodeSupported=false #59386
    area-Serialization
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #59387
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Refactoring XmlReader{Async} #59337
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Update area owners to include new owners of S.DS.* #59357
    area-Meta
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Change channel passed to ci_setup to track runtime branch #59071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move clang-format download into dotnet/runtime and add docs for setting up auto-formatting in the repository #59374
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: allow suppressing some dumps or parts of dumps #59299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Fix incorrect handling of character range and capitalization … #59425
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-rc2] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Prevent racing on installer shared props/targets #59276
  • Use XHarnessAppBundleToTest to create helix work items when runtime tests run on iOS and tvOS #58870
    * NO MERGE *
  • [wasm] Build improvements based on feedback #59391
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    area-Microsoft.Win32, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • CI matrix change: Add OSX 12 arm #59085
  • File preallocationSize: align Windows and Unix behavior. #59338
    area-System.IO
  • Refactoring XmlReaderSettings #59409
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
  • [draft][wasm] introduce typescript modules #59392
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • FreeBSD12 version cleanup and process and thread enhancements #59339
    community-contribution
  • Setup retry for System.Net.* tests #57370
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Improve ReliabilityFramework #59384
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono] Disable partial generic sharing for gparams with non-enum constraints. #59437
    arch-wasm

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Delete IsRuntimeImplemented #1588
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1587
  • Replace IRuntimeImplemented with RuntimeType and RuntimeAssembly basetype #1586
  • Move Regex DGML code to be debug-only #1585

Updated

  • Make BDDAlgebra lock reads too #1584

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make the pwsh dotnet installer script run on mac/linux #21284
  • With .NET 6.0 RC2(6.0.100-rc.2.21469.5) SDK, I can't install Blazor WebAssembly AOT workload. #21261
  • `dotnet workload install macos` installs the world #21251

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1379278 #21289
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add rollback option to install command and allow missing manifest ids #21283
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1379080 #21281
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1378946 #21278
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the documentation to include Zip Deploy #21272
    Area-WebSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377698 #21264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377506 #21262
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377453 #21260
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377423 #21259
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377304 #21253
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix up some test packages #21252
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1377055 #21249
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1379448 #21291
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #19229
  • Use a BlockingCollection in the logger to reduce CPU usage #21085
    Area-Install
  • Update ValidateExecutableReferences with new schema #19786
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx-rc2' => 'main' #21192
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Always reference .NET Framework reference assembly packages if using static GraphWithoutRuntimeDependencies #21236
    Area-External

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Open issue: list-pattern questions for 9/20/2021 #5201

Updated

  • Open issue: non-negative assumption should apply to both Count and Length #5137
  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
  • Calling interpolated string handler method on ref parameter (or ref local) causes compilation error #56624
  • Investigate lambda return type inference behavior for nested lambdas #56623
    17.0
  • Code fix for CS1591 to inherit documentation #56620
    Backlog
  • Compiler and IDE do not gracefully handle a generator being added twice #56619
    17.0
  • snippets do not expand for #region and #if #56618
  • Null ref in CommitSolutionUpdate #56617
    17.0
  • MessagePackSerializationException: Failed to serialize System.IO.Pipelines.PipeWriter value. #56613
  • [Coming Soon] Require .NET 6 RC1 SDK for Roslyn development #56612
  • Feature 'Navigate to' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #56607
    17.0
  • Do not show error CS0075 on non-ambiguous declarations #56604

Closed

  • Ambigious call in PLinq Aggregate method due to C#10 lambda type inference #56319
    17.0
  • .NET 6 RC 1: changes to overload resolution? Breaks NUnit? #56167
    17.0
  • MSBuild tasks should list the roslyn version #52265
    17.0
  • DiagnosticAnalyzer's Initialize method not getting called with VS 2019 upgrade #56449
    17.1
  • AdhocWorkspace.OpenDocument(documentId) causes parallel execution errors #56445
    17.0
  • Default XML comment for overriden properties/methods should be inherited. #54927
    Backlog
  • Syntax API for FileScopedNamespaces #54674
    17.0
  • Source generators: parallelize generation #42629
  • Make inheritdoc the default comment specification for interface implementation and override methods #56463
  • Inheritance margin navigation sometimes doesn't work #55791
    17.0
  • References not recognizing private fields #56496
  • Unable to set up editorconfig options like invert globally #56610
  • Compiler should allow assignment to discard - from ref-struct returning method. #39663
    17.0
  • "Sequence contains no elements" thrown from EmitSolutionUpdateAsync #56431
    17.0
  • Acquiring compilations when source generators are involved can significantly impact language features (i.e. completion) #55578
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update references for public 17.0 Preview 4 release #56626
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid unnecessary up-front captures to temps while lowering indexer access that uses “Index Pattern” #56611
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow user to change the nuget.org feed name without breaking Nuget suggestions #56606
    Area-IDE
  • Handle operators when rewriting expression trees #56598
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56622
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56621
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add missing releases to NuGet documentation #56546
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation, Next
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56616
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Log gold bars to the activity log #56614
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56615
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test to ensure completion won't trigger execution of source generator #56593
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only move the focus back to editor for Inheritance Margin when ESC is pressed #56603
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable async lightbulbs by default #56551
    Area-IDE
  • When "assigned", a `discard` doesn't escape out of the current expression. #56564
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56570
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Set CompilerApiVersion in Microsoft.Managed.Core.targets #56460
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix test #56605
    Area-Interactive, auto-merge, Next
  • Guard against updates with no type changes #56443
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix formatting of overload with new #56554
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add more tests around case sensitivity and project reference conversion #56490
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56630
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56629
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56627
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to object #56567
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up loc strings #56559
    Area-IDE
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash lowering property pattern where override lacks a get accessor #56586
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix the condition on passing BuildWithSkipAnalyzers marker file to FUTD #56371
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete ImmutableHashMap #31408
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Backlog
  • Add comment on usage of SLocalRegistry service on background thread #56591
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Enforce nullability contract in lambda body #56590
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • workspace.TryApplyChanges should respect changes to DefaultNamespace, and other project information #46021
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Calling ASP.NET Core Blazor WebAssembly app lifecycle event in MainLayout or App never gets called #36861
  • Type mismatches between parameter and route constraints not caught #36859
  • Update WiX package dependency #36854
  • Results.Problem does not support configuring Extensions #36848
    6.0-rc2
  • Static web assets not being included with NuGet package #36847
  • Add support for configurable log level #36841
  • After migrating to .NET 6 RC 1 No service for type Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration can be found #36829
    6.0-rc2
  • [Hot Reload] Source Generator Based Error Breaks Hot Reload #36825
    6.0.0

Closed

  • Verify new roslyn overload resolution changes don't break minimal API scenarios #36776
    6.0.0
  • Xamarin iOS: SignalR nuget package throws MissingMethodException #36763
  • Wrong diagnostic reported in nested nested C#/HTML scenarios #36124
    17.0-Preview5
  • BlazorWasm IdentityServer fetch rejects clients in Production #36812
    6.0.0
  • blazor = RenderFragment + MarkupString #36714
  • Hot Reload is not working at in Blazor wasm hosted app #36851
  • HealthCheck fails when using MapDynamicControllerRoute and DynamicRouteValueTransformer #36840
  • RequestDelegateFactory should produce clear errors for invalid Delegates #30322
    6.0-rc2
  • Examine Yarn.MSBuild for performance issues #22723
  • Remove continueOnBuildError for components e2e #35565
    6.0.0
  • Change default DateTime/TimeOnly/DateOnly parsing logic to use UTC #36725
    6.0-rc2
  • Building tag 5.0.10 fails installing dotnet #36834
  • Blazor, methods not called after moving to another page, no errors in console also #36811
  • Check your `.csproj` file. I had the exact same problem, when I had the following in my `.csproj`: #36837
  • New Project Dialog in VS2022: Language filter dropdown should NOT contain Angular/React/Vue #36800
  • Disable _content Static Web Assets Generation #36761
  • Dotnet Watch Net 6 Preview 5: The model item passed into the ViewDataDictionary is of type X but this ViewDataDictionary instance requires a model item of type X. #33636
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression: fortunes_nodejs #36722
  • Perf regression: json_actix #36737
  • Perf regression: json #36789
  • .Net 6 rc1 trimmer breaks WASM Azure AD Auth #36830

PullRequests

Created

  • Update WiX to signed build #36865
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Add the ConfigurationManager to the IServiceCollection (#36832) #36864
    area-runtime
  • Bump ansi-regex from 5.0.0 to 5.0.1 in /src/Components/Web.JS #36863
    area-blazor, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, javascript
  • Always download blazor-hotreload.js from app root #36862
    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc2' => 'release/6.0' #36860
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Include SharedFx bundle in Hosting Bundle, instead of SharedFx .msi #36858
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve Results.Problem and Results.ValidationProblem APIs #36856
    area-web-frameworks
  • Avoid creating list for single endpoint #36852
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update test matrix #36845

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:

Created

Closed

  • HasKey should override previous HasNoKey #24789
    6.0.0
  • Failed to load 6.0.0-preview.3.21201.4/libhostfxr.dylib, no suitable image found. Mac M1 #24971
  • Can't generate a migration using HiLo #26134
  • Customization of the ordering of extensions #26071
    6.0.0
  • Throw for a shadow Many-To-Many navigation #23362
    6.0.0
  • SQLite database created in wrong directory in packaged desktop app. #24213
    6.0.0
  • Using a Discriminator that is part of a composite key #18126

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Also try the .NET 5+ ApplicationData API #26114

Updated

    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
